channel.title: None on Jesús Pérez
channel.description: Recent content in None on Jesús Pérez

item.title: Interesting things I saw this week - 2
item.description: This was a slow week, between my internet being at the absolute worst speed possible and almost all my free time spent playing Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth (DSCS) on my Nintendo Switch I didn’t manage to find much, nevertheless I managed to see a few interesting things worth sharing. [blog post] “It’s collapsing violently”: Coronavirus is creating a fast fashion nightmare: An interview with Dana Thomas about the impact of coronavirus in the fast fashion industry.
